section.title: Thank You!
section.p: In this place we want to say thank you to everybody that is/was somehow involved in this project. Even if you did not end up here, whether it was just a few comments, criticism, some good ideas, patience, software to build on or build with, or lines of code, you have all taken part in making this project a working reality.
Below you can find a list of people which have significantly contributed to the project by working long and hard to make quality software for the rest of the world to use.

section.title: Credits for Work and Dervices We Depend On

ul.li: The Java language, for multiple reasons e.g. expressivity, portability etc.
The apache-ant project, for the great build tool.
The Forrest Project, for their great project documentation framework.
SourceForge, for all the facilities provided to open source efforts, and all the people that made SF becoming a reality.
